title: How serious is the threat of a postelection coup in Brazil?
dc:creator: Jack Nicas and André Spigariol

media:content.media:credit: Dado Galdieri para The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Supporters of Brazilian presidential candidate Jair Bolsonaro take part in a motorcade with first lady Michelle Bolsonaro in support of her husband in Brasília on Saturday.
